SELECT p.*,
pp.player_id AS PP__player_id, pp.nickname AS PP__nickname, pp.icon_id AS PP__icon_id, pp.created_at AS PP__created_at, pp.updated_at AS PP__updated_at,
pl.player_id AS PL__player_id, pl.total_login_days AS PL__total_login_days, pl.last_logged_in_at AS PL__last_logged_in_at, pl.created_at AS PL__created_at, pl.updated_at AS PL__updated_at
FROM gsync_player p LEFT JOIN gsync_player_profile pp ON p.player_id = pp.player_id LEFT JOIN gsync_player_login pl on p.player_id = pl.player_id WHERE p.player_id = #{playerId}
